title: Insect foods
creator_credit: Pat Dowling and Pat Dowling Pictures
brief_description: The purpose of this film is to show what and how insects eat, and to illustrate how the feeding habits of insects affect man. Shows clearly the feeding habits of certain insects. Could stimulate further discussion and interest and may kindle the enthusiasm of young people to aim at a career in entomology.
